thread.title: Donn Kranz
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Donn Kranz

author: Donn Kranz
title: Donn Kranz
text:
Everyone I dealt with was very accomodating and courteous and friendly.
i really appreciated their follow through and help in all that I needed to do.
Everything was handled very smoothly with no hangups or glitches .
Thanks to all involved! I really appreciate your assistance and professionalism.
